author: ate
msg: Enhanced PortalURL interface with getPageBasePath() and isSecure() methods.
Although this is a jetspeed-api interface change, it should have no impact on custom implementations
as long as these are based (extend) AbstractPortalURL which provides implementations of these methods.

msg: Switched to using divs in order to fix spacing issues

msg: adding @deprecated, using the message in impl/wrapped class

author: raphael
msg: Remove FusionPathInfoEncodingPortalURL which has been moved to Jetspeed
